job.title: Data Scientist- Tiktok Ads

Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and Tokyo ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAbout The Tiktok Monetization Product Data Science TeamltpgtltpgtWere the TikTok Monetization Products data to drive monetization and sustainable revenue growth for TikTok through data scienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgt Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis data mining and the presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and understand how our users interact with our ads productsltpgtltpgt Partner with Product and Engineering teams to solve problems and identify trends and opportunitiesltpgtltpgt Inform influence support and execute our product decisionsltpgtltpgt Buildmaintain reports dashboards and metrics to monitor the performance of our productsltpgtltpgt Mine massive amounts of data and extract useful product insightsltpgtltpgt Manage development of data resources gather requirements organize sources and support product launchesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt 5 years experience doing quantitative analysisltpgtltpgt BABS in Math Statistics Economics Computer Science or other quantitative field Advanced degrees preferred but not requiredltpgtltpgt Fluency in SQL or other programming languages Some development experience in at least one scripting language PHP Python Perl etcltpgtltpgt Experience with large data sets and distributed computing HiveHadoop a plusltpgtltpgt Ability to initiate and drive projects to completion with minimal guidanceltpgtltpgt The ability to
